Audio.Locality: S Pocone on Transpantaneira, Mato Grosso
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Response to playback from a male, starting softly, then a rapid jumbled series, before settling on 'typical' pace. Perched 3-4m up in low dead branches of taller tree along highway in cerrado. Mic provided strange humming at start of recording. Photo: link:http://www.flickr.com/photos/8013969@N03/5486716094/, link:http://www.flickr.com/photos/8013969@N03/5486121009
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Polioptila dumicola,Campylorhynchus turdinus,Oryzoborus angolensis,Crypturellus undulatus,Todirostrum cinereum
